title: Creole Seasoning Blend Recipe
description: This Creole seasoning adds amazing flavor to rice, meats, soups, and stews with a spice blend of paprika, onion, garlic, oregano, thyme, and cayenne.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Ingredients Herbs and Spices Recipes Seasoning Mix Recipes Creole Seasoning Blend 4.8 (515) 356 Reviews 46 Photos This Creole seasoning blend is great for adding flavor to rice, meats, soups, stews, or anything that needs a flavor boost. It also makes a great gift when placed in a decorative jar with the recipe attached. Submitted by JOSLYN Updated on November 7, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 46 46 46 46 Prep Time: 5 mins Total Time: 5 mins Servings: 20 Yield: 1 1/4 cups Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 20 servings 5 tablespoons paprika 3 tablespoons salt 2 tablespoons onion powder 2 tablespoons garlic powder 2 tablespoons dried oregano 2 tablespoons dried basil 1 tablespoon dried thyme 1 tablespoon black pepper 1 tablespoon white pepper 1 tablespoon cayenne pepper Directions Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Combine paprika, salt, onion powder, garlic powder, oregano, basil, thyme, black pepper, white pepper, and cayenne pepper. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Store in an airtight container. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 810 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 16 Calories 0g Fat 3g Carbs 1g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 20 Calories 16 % Daily Value * Total Fat 0g 1% Saturated Fat 0g 1% Sodium 1048mg 46% Total Carbohydrate 3g 1% Dietary Fiber 2g 5% Total Sugars 1g Protein 1g 1% Vitamin C 2mg 3% Calcium 30mg 2% Iron 1mg 7% Potassium 90mg 2% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Creole Seasoning Blend 01 of 46 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 46 Photo by  BraveBun1674 11/01/2023 Look 03 of 46 Photo by  BubblyBass2666 08/10/2023 04 of 46 Photo by  Linda 02/20/2022 This is an excellent seasoning recipe! The only change I made was substituting the white pepper for more black pepper. I think this blend is amazing. Not too salty. Zippy but not overly spicy. We used it on steaks and thought it was amazing. I can't wait to try it on everything. 05 of 46 Photo by  simone37 10/09/2021 06 of 46 Photo by  J Norman 02/27/2021 07 of 46 Photo by  Whitney 07/27/2020 08 of 46 Photo by  Teresa 05/03/2020 09 of 46 Photo by  shannaaf 12/28/2019 10 of 46 Photo by  Kristi31078 10/08/2019 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Blackened Seasoning Mix 184 Ratings Jim Goode's BBQ Beef Rub 36 Ratings Tennessee Rubdown 31 Ratings Italian Seasoning 88 Ratings Dry Spice Rub for Lamb or Beef 18 Ratings Hugh's Dry Rub 318 Ratings Spicy Herb Seasoning 4 Ratings Best BBQ Rub in Texas 34 Ratings Cajun Seasoning Spice Mix 454 Ratings Chili Seasoning Mix I 42 Ratings Chicken Seasoning Blend 204 Ratings Johnny's Spice Rub 228 Ratings Mediterranean Spice Rub 16 Ratings Spicy Chicken Breasts 704 Ratings Herbs de Provence 71 Ratings Traci's Adobo Seasoning 182 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
